author: Peter Nicholas
title: Trump Defends His Approach to Putin in Phone Conversation
text:
The White House on Wednesday defended a phone conversation between President Donald Trump and Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin, saying Mr. Trump made headway by striking a cordial tone rather than taking a more confrontational approach as suggested by his national security advisers.

“I called President Putin of Russia to congratulate him on his election victory (in past, Obama called him also),” Mr. Trump tweeted. “The Fake News Media is crazed because they wanted me to excoriate him. They are wrong! Getting along with Russia... RELATED VIDEO Putin Displays Video Appearing to Show New Nuclear Weapons Russian President Vladimir Putin used his annual state of the union address to show off a series of new armaments, including nuclear weapons he claims are capable of penetrating U.S. air-defense systems.
